entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
